name: River Runner (sornerol)
description:
River Runner is a remake of Carol Shaw's classic Atari 2600 shooter River Raid.

Controls
  • A / left arrow: move left
  • D / right arrow: move right
  • W / up arrow: speed up
  • S/ down arrow: slow down
  • Space bar: Shoot
Gameplay tips
  • Your fuel burn rate is the same regardless of what speed you're traveling. If you're running low on fuel, try slowing down as you pass over a fuel depot so that you spend more time fueling.
  • You can shoot fuel depots as you are fueling. This allows you to score points for destroying them while still being able to refuel.
